properties.name: cae.hashing.backward-compatibility
properties.description: If enabled the deprecated com.coremedia.blueprint.cae.util.DefaultSecureHashCodeGeneratorStrategy will be used for securing blob transformation. If set to false the com.coremedia.blueprint.cae.util.MD5SecureHashCodeGeneratorStrategy will be used.

properties.name: cae.hashing.migration-mode
properties.description: If enabled the com.coremedia.blueprint.cae.util.DefaultToMd5MigrationSecureHashCodeGeneratorStrategy will be used for securing blob transformation. This may be used for a smooth migration from com.coremedia.blueprint.cae.util.DefaultSecureHashCodeGeneratorStrategy to com.coremedia.blueprint.cae.util.MD5SecureHashCodeGeneratorStrategy.
